name: Pony Rainbow Jump
description:
Welcome to Pony Rainbow Jump, an action-packed pony-themed game about jumping over apple barrels!

All jokes aside, this is simply a remake of a game I made on the Nintendo DS with WarioWare DIY back in 2015. Just thought it would be fun to do this as a quick challenge/experiment in the Unity Game Engine.  It ended up taking a lot longer then planned, but I finally finished it recently and wanted to share it with the world.

Enjoy!!

DISCLAIMER: The physics are supposed to be whack. Just so you know : )
